entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Partly cloudy. High minus 26 with temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 26 with temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
